directions: Whip heavy cream until stiff peaks in large bowl. Combine sweetened condensed milk, pecans, butter and maple extract in large bowl. Mix well. Fold in whipped cream.
Pour into 9x5-inch loaf pan or 2-quart container; cover. Freeze 6 hours or until firm. Store in freezer.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can Eagle Brand® Sweetened Condensed Milk
title: Butter Pecan Ice Cream from Eagle Brand®
